Package entity

Class Stove

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Stove

  • public class Stove
extends java.lang.Object

    This represents the stove each chef has in his restaurant

    Since:
    2018-04

    • Constructor Detail

      • Stove

        public Stove​(int stoveID,
             long startTime,
             int cookingTime,
             java.lang.String dishName,
             boolean eaten)
        Create a Stove object with specific stove id, start time, cooking time, and the dish being cooked on it
        Parameters:
        stoveID - the id of the stove
        startTime - the start time of the stove when it is cooking
        cookingTime - the time it needs to cook for the dish
        dishName - the dish being cooked on it
        eaten - true if the dish on the stove is eaten. Otherwise false

        public java.lang.String getStatusBar​()
        Get the status bar that represents the progress of the dish cooked
        Returns:
        the status bar [ ########## ] of the stove

      • getStatus

        public int getStatus​()
        Get the status of the stove
        Returns:
        0 is empty, 1 is cooking, 2 is done, 3 is spoilt, 4 is eaten

      • getDishName
